page.title: 13Attitudes
page.content: We went out in our area to find out how peoples attitudes varied over different items.First we chose computers.Most of the children found them interesting and fun to play games on ,they also told us how they were being introduced into their school work.However,the adults looked at them from a different angle.They could see that they were changing peoples way of life rapidly and that this could produce loss of employment,as people were being replaced by computers.An example of this was discovered when we contacted six local firms to find that they used computers for wages,stock control, and details of staff and customers. Our next topic was nuclear power.It was felt that the majority of people thought it to be a good idea if it was to be used in the right circumstances.
